What is the significance of the band gap in semiconductors for logic devices?
data.answer: An appreciable finite band gap is needed for the performance of logic devices.

What is the role of the π-extended ligand OHPTP in the synthesis of Cu2(OHPTP)?
data.answer: It is used to synthesize the first rhombic 2D c-MOF single crystals.

What is the significance of the unique slipped AA stacking in Cu2(OHPTP)?
data.answer: It results in an overlap of the aromatic cores while preventing a direct stacking of Cu atoms.
